Subject: We want to increase our disk size for our endpoint protector server
Description: We want to increase our disk size for our endpoint protector server
What_We_Know__c:
Customer would like to increase their disk space of the EPP server. 

The server is hosted on the Google Cloud.
Next_Steps__c:
We have requested his availability, so we can schedule a remote session.

10-04 We have provided our availability for tomorrow and the meeting details.

11-04 In the meeting we have successfully increase the disk space and we have also optimised the server.
